document.full_text: the yankees ended a six-game slide with a solid outing from ivan nova, two homers from alex rodriguez and two hits from jorge posada in his return to the lineup.
document.title: yankees 6, rays 2: yankees snap losing streak, quieting concerns along way
lines_and_colors: the yankees ended a six-game slide with a solid outing from ivan nova, two homers from alex rodriguez and two hits from jorge posada in his return to the lineup.
